overview_of_class: Differential geometry of curves and surfaces, including metric extrinsic and intrinsic curvature and Gauss' Theorem Egregium. This will constitute the bulk of the course. Topics will be chosen from: the Gauss-Bonnet theorem, minimal surfaces, connections to special and general relativity, geodesics, and higher dimensions.
name: Introduction to Differential Geometry
title: WCAS MATH 342-0-81 Introduction to Differential Geometry
